context.p: The floating license key registered for the current instance will be released automatically when the connection with the license server is lost (after closing the application or as a result of a network failure).

p.product: editor editorEclipse author authorEclipse developer developerEclipse

context.p: To manually release a floating license key to be returned to the server's pool of available license keys:

step.cmd: Go to the main preferences panel the menu Help .
Select Use a license key as licensing method.
Paste a Named User license key in the registration dialog. Leave the text area empty to return to the previously used license key, if any.
Press the OK button of the dialog.
